item.title: Kharghar, Ulwe, Dronagiri: No Water Sunday. Tankers Incoming?

blockquote.p: TLDR: Dry taps hit Kharghar, Ulwe, and Dronagiri this Sunday. CIDCO's fixing something, so fill those buckets and prepare for a classic Navi Mumbai water crisis.

description.p: Heads up, folks in Kharghar, Ulwe, and Dronagiri: Sunday's looking parched. CIDCO announced a water supply disruption for “urgent repairs.” Translation: something broke. The official line is that supply will be off from 10 AM to 6 PM. Unofficially? Pack extra patience.

item.title: Nerul creep: Man held for obscene teen Insta fake

blockquote.p: TLDR: Nerul teen harassed with fake Instagram profile. Cyber cops nabbed the culprit; turns out, it's an uncle from Sector 21.

description.p: If you thought Instagram was just for brunch pics and influencer scams, think again. A 19-year-old from Nerul found out the hard way when some loser created a fake account in her name and started posting obscene garbage. Think morphed photos and creepy DMs sent to her contacts. Nightmare fuel.
